mapper.select:
select dbo.clbmb.clhh, dbo.clbmb.clmc from dbo.clbmb where
clmc like '%${searchc}%'
mapper.insert: insert into dbo.clbmb ( clhh, lbbh, clmc, jldw, zhxs, yshh, ysmc, cbdj, jhdj, kzdj, fzkj, cgbl, ylbl, shbl, yxqx, ghzq, cgtqq, zjbj, cgbj, aqlbj, yhyl, clth, cgym, bzsm, bcpbj, bcpbh, bcplb, cltp, gdbj, sqrm, czym, czsj, lkcbj, bmgz, fzzbj, zhbj, zhgs, txgz, gsbh, spbj, sprm, spsj, yzws, djyz, cgzh, free, yxbj, gdrm, gdsj, jjczym, jjczsj, qssxsj, jzsxsj, gxbh, hbdj, scys, clzc, sprm_kj, spsj_kj, gjfdxs ) values ( #{clhh}, #{lbbh}, #{clmc}, #{jldw}, #{zhxs}, #{yshh}, #{ysmc}, #{cbdj}, #{jhdj}, #{kzdj}, #{fzkj}, #{cgbl}, #{ylbl}, #{shbl}, #{yxqx}, #{ghzq}, #{cgtqq}, #{zjbj}, #{cgbj}, #{aqlbj}, #{yhyl}, #{clth}, #{cgym}, #{bzsm}, #{bcpbj}, #{bcpbh}, #{bcplb}, #{cltp}, #{gdbj}, #{sqrm}, #{czym}, #{czsj}, #{lkcbj}, #{bmgz}, #{fzzbj}, #{zhbj}, #{zhgs}, #{txgz}, #{gsbh}, #{spbj}, #{sprm}, #{spsj}, #{yzws}, #{djyz}, #{cgzh}, #{free}, #{yxbj}, #{gdrm}, #{gdsj}, #{jjczym}, #{jjczsj}, #{qssxsj}, #{jzsxsj}, #{gxbh}, #{hbdj}, #{scys}, #{clzc}, #{sprm_kj}, #{spsj_kj}, #{gjfdxs} )
mapper.update: update dbo.clbmb set clhh = #{clhh}, lbbh = #{lbbh}, clmc = #{clmc}, jldw = #{jldw}, zhxs = #{zhxs}, yshh = #{yshh}, ysmc = #{ysmc}, cbdj = #{cbdj}, jhdj = #{jhdj}, kzdj = #{kzdj}, fzkj = #{fzkj}, cgbl = #{cgbl}, ylbl = #{ylbl}, shbl = #{shbl}, yxqx = #{yxqx}, ghzq = #{ghzq}, cgtqq = #{cgtqq}, zjbj = #{zjbj}, cgbj = #{cgbj}, aqlbj = #{aqlbj}, yhyl = #{yhyl}, clth = #{clth}, cgym = #{cgym}, bzsm = #{bzsm}, bcpbj = #{bcpbj}, bcpbh = #{bcpbh}, bcplb = #{bcplb}, cltp = #{cltp}, gdbj = #{gdbj}, sqrm = #{sqrm}, czym = #{czym}, czsj = #{czsj}, lkcbj = #{lkcbj}, bmgz = #{bmgz}, fzzbj = #{fzzbj}, zhbj = #{zhbj}, zhgs = #{zhgs}, txgz = #{txgz}, gsbh = #{gsbh}, spbj = #{spbj}, sprm = #{sprm}, spsj = #{spsj}, yzws = #{yzws}, djyz = #{djyz}, cgzh = #{cgzh}, free = #{free}, yxbj = #{yxbj}, gdrm = #{gdrm}, gdsj = #{gdsj}, jjczym = #{jjczym}, jjczsj = #{jjczsj}, qssxsj = #{qssxsj}, jzsxsj = #{jzsxsj}, gxbh = #{gxbh}, hbdj = #{hbdj}, scys = #{scys}, clzc = #{clzc}, sprm_kj = #{sprm_kj}, spsj_kj = #{spsj_kj}, gjfdxs = #{gjfdxs} where = #{}
